main.js(2,15): error TS8023: JSDoc '@extends Mismatch' does not match the 'extends B' clause.
main.js(3,17): error TS8010: Type annotations can only be used in TypeScript files.


==== super.js (0 errors) ====
    export class B { }
    
==== main.js (2 errors) ====
    import { B } from './super'
    /** @extends {Mismatch} */
                  ~~~~~~~~
!!! error TS8023: JSDoc '@extends Mismatch' does not match the 'extends B' clause.
    class C extends B { }
                    ~
!!! error TS8010: Type annotations can only be used in TypeScript files.
